00075                         $this->PageComposer = get_package( 'page::page_composer' , 'last' , __FILE__ );

00110             function                process_accordion_section( $Str , $Changed )
00111             {
00112                   try
00113                   {
00114                         $Limitations = array( 'master_id' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00115                         
00116                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'accordion_section' , $Limitations ) ; )
00117                         {
00118                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00119 
00120                               $Code = '<h3><a href="#">{lang:'.$this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'title' ).'}</a></h3>';
00121                               
00122                               $Str = str_replace( "{accordion_section:$Parameters}" , $Code , $Str );
00123                               $Changed = true;
00124                         }
00125                         
00126                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00127                   }
00128                   catch( Exception $e )
00129                   {
00130                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00131                   }
00132             }

00156             function                get_records( &$Settings )
00157             {
00158                   try
00159                   {
00160                         $PackageName = $Settings->get_setting( 'package_name' );
00161                         $PackageVersion = $Settings->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' );
00162                         $FunctionName = $Settings->get_setting( 'access_function_name' , 'simple_select' );
00163                         
00164                         $Package = get_package( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , __FILE__ );
00165                         
00166                         if( method_exists( $Package , $FunctionName ) )
00167                         {
00168                               return( call_user_func( array( $Package , $FunctionName ) ) );
00169                         }
00170                         else
00171                         {
00172                               throw( 
00173                                     new Exception( "Function '$FunctionName' does not exists in the package '$PackageName'" )
00174                               );
00175                         }
00176                   }
00177                   catch( Exception $e )
00178                   {
00179                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00180                   }
00181             }

00205             function                select_dialog_content( &$Settings )
00206             {
00207                   try
00208                   {
00209                         $Records = $this->get_records( $this->BlockSettings );
00210                               
00211                         $DataSource = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 
00212                               'data_source' , md5( $PackageName.microtime( true ) )
00213                         );
00214                         $Name = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' , $DataSource );
00215 
00216                         $Checked = 'checked';
00217                         $SimpleRecords = '';
00218                         foreach( $Records as $k => $v )
00219                         {
00220                               $SimpleRecords = '<div style="height: 20px; white-space:nowrap; overflow: hidden;">'.
00221                                        '<input style="vertical-align: baseline; display: inline;" '.$Checked.
00222                                        ' type="radio" name="'.$Name.'" value="'.get_field( $v , 'id' ).'" id="'.
00223                                        $DataSource.get_field( $v , 'id' ).'">'.'<label style="margin-left: 2px; vertical-align: '.
00224                                        '3px; cursor: pointer; white-space:nowrap;" for="'.$DataSource.get_field( $v , 'id' ).'">'.
00225                                           get_field( $v , 'title' ).'</label></div>';
00226                               $Checked = '';
00227                         }
00228                         
00229                         return( $SimpleRecords );
00230                   }
00231                   catch( Exception $e )
00232                   {
00233                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00234                   }
00235             }

00264             function                process_select_dialog_content( $Str , $Changed )
00265             {
00266                   try
00267                   {
00268                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'select_dialog_content' ) ; )
00269                         {
00270                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00271                               
00272                               $SimpleRecords = $this->select_dialog_content( $this->BlockSettings );
00273                               
00274                               $id = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' , md5( microtime( true ) ) );
00275                               
00276                               $Type = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'type' , 'simple' );
00277                               $ViewDialogScript = $Type == 'simple' ? 
00278                                     $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'simple_select_dialog.tpl' ) : '';
00279                               
00280                               $ViewDialogScript = str_replace( '{id}' , $id , $ViewDialogScript );
00281                               $ViewDialogScript = str_replace( '{records}' , $SimpleRecords , $ViewDialogScript );
00282                               
00283                               $Str = str_replace( "{select_dialog_content:$Parameters}" , $ViewDialogScript , $Str );
00284                               $Changed = true;
00285                         }
00286                         
00287                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00288                   }
00289                   catch( Exception $e )
00290                   {
00291                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00292                   }
00293             }

00321             function                process_select_dialog( $Str , $Changed )
00322             {
00323                   try
00324                   {
00325                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'select_dialog' ) ; )
00326                         {
00327                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00328                               
00329                               $DataSource = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'data_source' , md5( rand().microtime( true ) ) );
00330                               $this->BlockSettings->set_setting( 'data_source' , $DataSource );
00331                               
00332                               $id = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' , md5( microtime( true ) ) );
00333                               $this->BlockSettings->set_setting( 'id' , $id );
00334                               
00335                               $ViewDialogScript = '{select_dialog_content:'.$this->BlockSettings->get_all_settings().
00336                                                             '}{dialog:selector=#'.$id.';'.$this->BlockSettings->get_all_settings().
00337                                                             ';cancel=true;ok_processor=ultimix.ExtractSimpleSelectResult}';
00338                               
00339                               $Str = str_replace( "{select_dialog:$Parameters}" , $ViewDialogScript , $Str );
00340                               $Changed = true;
00341                         }
00342                         
00343                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00344                   }
00345                   catch( Exception $e )
00346                   {
00347                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00348                   }
00349             }

00377             function                process_view_dialog( $Str , $Changed )
00378             {
00379                   try
00380                   {
00381                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'view_dialog' ) ; )
00382                         {
00383                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00384                               $id = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' , md5( microtime( true ) ) );
00385                               
00386                               if( isset( $this->Dialogs[ $id ] ) )
00387                               {
00388                                     $ViewDialogScript = '';
00389                               }
00390                               else
00391                               {
00392                                     $AllSettings = $this->BlockSettings->get_all_settings();
00393                                     $ViewDialogScript = "<div id=\"$id\">{direct_view:$AllSettings}</div>{dialog:selector=#$id;".
00394                                           "$AllSettings}";
00395                                     $this->Dialogs[ $id ] = true;
00396                               }
00397                               /* must be so to prevent multiple dialogs creation */
00398                               $Str = str_replace_once( "{view_dialog:$Parameters}" , $ViewDialogScript , $Str );
00399                               $Changed = true;
00400                         }
00401                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00402                   }
00403                   catch( Exception $e )
00404                   {
00405                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00406                   }
00407             }

00534             function                append_add_opener_if_necessary( $DialogInitScript )
00535             {
00536                   try
00537                   {
00538                         if( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'opener' , '' ) != '' )
00539                         {
00540                               $Selector = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'selector' );
00541                               $DataSource = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'data_source' , $Selector );
00542                               $DataAcceptor = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'data_acceptor' , '' );
00543                               $StatusAcceptor = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'status_acceptor' , '' );
00544                               $DialogInitScript .= "{add_opener:data_source=$DataSource;data_acceptor=$DataAcceptor;".
00545                                                              "status_acceptor=$StatusAcceptor;before_open_validation=".
00546                                                              $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'before_open_validation' , 'nop' ).
00547                                                              ';opener='.$this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'opener' ).';selector='.
00548                                                              $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'selector' ).'}';
00549                         }
00550                         
00551                         return( $DialogInitScript );
00552                   }
00553                   catch( Exception $e )
00554                   {
00555                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00556                   }
00557             }

00573             function                prepare_data_for_dialog()
00574             {
00575                   try
00576                   {
00577                         $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'selector' );
00578                         
00579                         $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'title' , '' );
00580                         $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'width' , '480' );
00581                         $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'height' , '320' );
00582                         $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'modal' , 'true' );
00583                         $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'auto_open' , 'false' );
00584                         $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'hide_close_button' , 'false' );
00585                         $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'resizable' , 'true' );
00586                         $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'ok_processor' , '' );
00587                         $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'cancel' , 'false' );
00588                         $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'on_open' , 'nop()' );
00589                         $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'close_on_escape' , 'true' );
00590                   }
00591                   catch( Exception $e )
00592                   {
00593                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00594                   }
00595             }

00623             function                process_dialog( $Str , $Changed )
00624             {
00625                   try
00626                   {
00627                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'dialog' ) ; )
00628                         {
00629                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00630                               
00631                               $this->prepare_data_for_dialog();
00632                               
00633                               $DialogInitScript = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'dialog_init.tpl' );
00634                               
00635                               $Data = $this->BlockSettings->get_raw_settings();
00636                               
00637                               $DialogInitScript = $this->String->print_record( $DialogInitScript , $Data );
00638                               
00639                               $DialogInitScript = $this->append_add_opener_if_necessary( $DialogInitScript );
00640                               
00641                               $Str = str_replace( "{dialog:$Parameters}" , $DialogInitScript , $Str );
00642                               $Changed = true;
00643                         }
00644                         
00645                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00646                   }
00647                   catch( Exception $e )
00648                   {
00649                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00650                   }
00651             }

00679             function                process_add_opener( $Str , $Changed )
00680             {
00681                   try
00682                   {
00683                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'add_opener' ) ; )
00684                         {
00685                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00686                               
00687                               $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'selector' );
00688                               $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'opener' );
00689                               
00690                               $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'before_open_validation' , 'nop' );
00691                               $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'data_source' , '' );
00692                               $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'data_acceptor' , '' );
00693                               $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'status_acceptor' , '' );
00694                               
00695                               $AddOpenerScript = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'add_opener.tpl' );
00696                               $Data = $this->BlockSettings->get_raw_settings();
00697                               $AddOpenerScript = $this->String->print_record( $AddOpenerScript , $Data );
00698                               
00699                               $Str = str_replace( "{add_opener:$Parameters}" , $AddOpenerScript , $Str );
00700                               $Changed = true;
00701                         }
00702                         
00703                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00704                   }
00705                   catch( Exception $e )

00738             {
00739                   try
00740                   {
00741                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'tab_control' ) ; )

00747                                     '{id}' ,

00793             function                process_add_tab( $Str , $Changed )
00794             {
00795                   try
00796                   {
00797                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'add_tab' ) ; )
00798                         {
00799                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00800 
00801                               $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' );
00802                               $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'content_id' );
00803                               
00804                               $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'title' , 'title' );
00805                               $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'index' , -1 );
00806                               $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'closable' , 'true' );
00807                               
00808                               $Tab = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'add_tab.tpl' );
00809                               $Data = $this->BlockSettings->get_raw_settings();
00810                               $Tab = $this->String->print_record( $Tab , $Data );
00811                               
00812                               $Str = str_replace( "{add_tab:$Parameters}" , $Tab , $Str );
00813                               $Changed = true;
00814                         }
00815                         
00816                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00817                   }
00818                   catch( Exception $e )
00819                   {
00820                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00821                   }

00850             function                process_add_iframe_tab( $Str , $Changed )
00851             {
00852                   try
00853                   {
00854                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'add_iframe_tab' ) ; )
00855                         {
00856                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00857                               $Tab = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'add_iframe_tab.tpl' );
00858 
00859                               $Selector = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'selector' , '' );
00860                               $Tab = str_replace( '{id}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' , $Selector ) , $Tab );
00861                               $Tab = str_replace( '{url}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'url' ) , $Tab );
00862                               $Tab = str_replace( '{title}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'title' , 'title' ) , $Tab );
00863                               $Tab = str_replace( '{index}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'index' , -1 ) , $Tab );
00864                               $Tab = str_replace( '{height}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'height' , 'auto' ) , $Tab );
00865                               $Tab = str_replace( 
00866                                     '{closable}' , 
00867                                     $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'closable' , false ) !== false ? 'true' : 'false' , $Tab
00868                               );
00869                               
00870                               $Str = str_replace( "{add_iframe_tab:$Parameters}" , $Tab , $Str );
00871                               $Changed = true;
00872                         }
00873                         
00874                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00875                   }
00876                   catch( Exception $e )
00877                   {
00878                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00879                   }
00880             }
00881             
00912             function                process_string( $Options , $Str , &$Changed )
00913             {
00914                   try
00915                   {     
00916                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_accordion_section( $Str , $Changed );
00917                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_select_dialog_content( $Str , $Changed );
00918                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_select_dialog( $Str , $Changed );
00919                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_view_dialog( $Str , $Changed );
00920                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_static_dialog( $Str , $Changed );
00921                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_iframe_dialog( $Str , $Changed );
00922                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_dialog( $Str , $Changed );
00923                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_add_opener( $Str , $Changed );
00924                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_tab_control( $Str , $Changed );
00925                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_add_tab( $Str , $Changed );
00926                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_add_iframe_tab( $Str , $Changed );
00927 
00928                         return( $Str );
00929                   }
00930                   catch( Exception $e )
00931                   {
00932                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00933                   }
00934             }
00935       }
